Validation checks used in ensembles¶

The imbalanced_ensemble.utils module includes various utilities.

check_eval_datasets(eval_datasets[, …])

Check eval_datasets parameter.

check_eval_metrics(eval_metrics)

Check parameter eval_metrics.

check_target_label_and_n_target_samples(y, …)

Jointly check target_label and n_target_samples parameters.

check_balancing_schedule(balancing_schedule)

Check the balancing_schedule parameter.
